content.title: Assign Data to the Segment
content.body:
Let’s get started!

In this hike, we will:

  • Modify the segment template from the template
  • Assign data to the widgets in the template

 

Before you begin, ensure that you have completed the following hike:

  1. Introduction to Segment

 

Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hikes.

To open a closed project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > EmployeeList.

 

When you are ready, click Start!
